message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $180. This is a limited-time offer, and I believe it offers great value considering its worth to you is $150.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I think we can come to an agreement closer to the value I place on the product. How about $160?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your position and would like to meet you halfway. My counteroffer is $170 for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet halfway, Alice. Considering my valuation of the product, I propose $165 as my counteroffer.
